help.helpText1: This is where I would put the tutorial for tidyBee

parameters.top_parameters: Display of the number of files in the Tops
parameters.unused_file_durations: From which moment is the file considered unused
parameters.size_thresholds: From what size is it considered too heavy

help.unused: This widget shows the number of unused files on your shared spaces and its evolution since last month
help.heavy: This widget shows the number of heavy files on your shared spaces and its evolution since last month
help.badname: This widget shows the number of misnammed files on your shared spaces and its evolution since last month
help.duplicate: This widget shows the number of duplicated files on your shared spaces and its evolution since last month
help.storage: This widget shows the current usage of your shared spaces and its evolution since last month

grade.help: This widget shows the overall grade of your shared space
grade.title: The Grade of your shared space has been estimated by Tidybee.

graph.help: This widget displays the percentage of files pertaining to each grade of the TidyScore
graph.title: Analysis of your storage space
